name: MixedInkGroups
shortdesc: A collection of mixed ink groups.

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the MixedInkGroup.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new mixed ink group.

parameter.name: inkList
parameter.shortdesc: The inks to include in the mix.

parameter.name: inkPercentages
parameter.shortdesc: The percent of each ink in the ink list. &#40;Range: 0 to 100 for each ink) (Optional)

parameter.name: repeatValues
parameter.shortdesc: The number of repetitions for each ink in the ink list. &#40;Range: 0 to 100 for each ink) (Optional)

parameter.name: incrementValues
parameter.shortdesc: The increment percent per repetition for each ink. &#40;Range: 0 to 100) Note: The cumulative ink percentage per ink cannot exceed 100.) (Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new MixedInkGroup &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroups within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The MixedInkGroup, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: MixedInkGroup, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The MixedInkGroup, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: MixedInkGroup, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first MixedInkGroup in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last MixedInkGroup in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle MixedInkGroup in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroup with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the MixedInkGroup that follows the desired MixedInkGroup.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the MixedInkGroup whose index follows the specified MixedInkGroup in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The MixedInkGroup whose index comes before the desired MixedInkGroup.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any MixedInkGroup in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every MixedInkGroup in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the MixedInkGroup.
Returns the MixedInkGroup with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
